items.text: A black hole is like a cosmic vacuum cleaner, so strong that even light can’t escape its grasp!
Imagine a point in space where if you cross it, there's no turning back—that's the event horizon!
Black holes are like the ultimate hide-and-seek champions; they don’t reflect any light, making them invisible!
